name: Dead Shells
description:
Armed with only a makeshift melee weapon (a wrench fused with a metal pipe) and the newfound ability to manipulate time and slow it down for fleeting moments to gain an edge, this game revolve around solving puzzles and unraveling the secrets to escape the chilling land of the dead shells.




Your goal is to be precise, quick, and responsive to defend yourself and survive long enough to solve the puzzle to escape the land-A graveyard. You will have the opportunity to gain an edge with a new found ability of slowing down time for a brief moment and finding adrenaline pills will help you activate and maintain it.
